mapper.insert: insert into f_board (f_board_title, f_board_content, f_id) values (#{f_board_title}, #{f_board_content}, #{f_id})
mapper.select: select f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_id, f_board_hits, f_board_date, f_reply_count, f_num from f_board where f_board_num=#{f_board_num}
mapper.update: update f_board set f_board_title=#{f_board_title}, f_board_content=#{f_board_content} where f_board_num=#{f_board_num}
mapper.select: select f_board_num, f_board_title, f_board_content, f_id, f_board_hits, f_board_date, f_reply_count, f_num from f_board where f_board_num>0 order by f_board_num desc, f_board_date desc
